name: Halloween Girls MakeUp Makeover Party - Kids Games
name_original: Halloween Girls MakeUp Makeover Party - Kids Games
description:
Get ready for the best Halloween Makeover Simulator! Play fun spooky, rainbow and face-painting makeover rooms to look your best for Halloween!

Halloween Makeover Salon:
Level 1: Paint the face, apply hair-coloring, add sparkly make-up and more!

Level 2: Go to the Halloween Spa! Apply face-mask and relax at the spa!

Level 3: Face-painting room! Do a fun makeover with rainbow designs and more!

Level 4: Help clean-up and care for the monster on Halloween night!

Level 5: Hair makeover salon! Apply rainbow hair-coloring,

Level 6: Have fun painting and look your best with a cool Halloween makeover!

Level 7: Apply crazy make-up for the party!

Level 8: Halloween costumes and makeover salon room!

*Level 9: Go to a fun Halloween party! Add lights, decorate and much more!

*Level 10: Go out to treat or treat! Clean-up and eat candy!

*Level 11: Get ready for a spooky zombie wedding salon!

Face Painting & Make-Up Salon:
*Level 1: Go to the spa, cut hair, use tweezers and clean-up. Then get ready for a new facepainting makeover!

*Level 2: Add make-up and do a cool new design!

*Level 3: Remove old face-paint and paint another design in the makeover room!

*Level 4: Princess salon room with magic butterfly, ice princess and more!

*Level 5: Add earrings, necklace and accessories to complete the princess fashion look!

*Level 6: Sugar make-up and face-painting!! Add a fun new design and look your best!

*Level 7: Time for painting party! Add a new dress, accessories and more!

*Level 8: Rainbow Fashion tiger room! Get a stylish new makeover!

*Level 9: Face painting salon room! Decorate with the best face paint characters! Watch a fashion show!

*Level 10: Apply a cool new face paint design! Have fun!

*Please note that levels 9-21 must be purchased separately.
*Please note that Halloween Makeover Simulator is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items and remove advertisments with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Kids Games Studio is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.
